workspace.description: You can create multiple workspaces to handle different data analysis tasks. Each workspace has independent file management, data processing rules, and data processing flows.
workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace?
workspace.exitWarning: You will lose all unsaved changes if you leave the workspace.
workspace.exitDescription: You will lose all unsaved changes if you leave the workspace.
workspace.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace? This action cannot be undone!

validation.missingNodes: Connection missing source or target node
validation.singleInputOnly: {{nodeType}} can only have one input connection
validation.cycleDetected: This connection would create a cycle, not allowed
validation.needIndexSource: Flow must contain at least one index source node
validation.needOutput: Flow must contain at least one output node
validation.singleOutputOnly: Flow can only contain one output node
validation.cycleInFlow: Cycle detected in flow, please check node connections

sheetSelector.noFile: Sheet Selector node must select a file
sheetSelector.noSheet: Please select a manually specified sheet name

filter.incomplete: Filter node is not fully configured
filter.noConditions: Please add at least one filter condition

join.insufficientInputs: Join node must have two or more inputs
join.noType: Join node must have a join type selected
join.noKeys: Join node must have left and right join keys specified

aggregation.incomplete: Aggregation node must specify a group by column and have at least one aggregation operation
aggregation.invalidOperation: Invalid aggregation operation in Aggregation node

columnOperation.noOperation: Column Operation node must have at least one operation
columnOperation.incompleteOperation: An operation in the Column Operation node is not fully configured

csvOutput.noPath: CSV Output node must specify an output file path

excelOutput.noPath: Excel Output node must specify an output file path

flow.autoMatchIndex: Auto match index to sheet name
flow.addConditionsPrompt: Please add filter conditions to filter data
flow.autoLayoutTooltip: Auto layout based on node connections

indexSourceNode.help: Which data items do you want to count? For example, if you want to count a column in a table, select "Column Name" and select the corresponding column name (this is the most common case). Otherwise, select "Sheet Name".

sheetSelectorNode.help: Which table contains the information corresponding to your index items? If the index items correspond to the table name of an Excel file, please select automatic matching, otherwise please select manual matching.

rowLookupNode.help: This node will filter out the corresponding rows in the worksheet corresponding to the index items output by the upstream node. It is almost identical to Excel's filtering functionality.
rowLookupNode.description: This node will lookup all rows in the table where column "{{column}}" matches the index value

rowFilterNode.help: Filter all rows of the previous level table by certain conditions

aggregatorNode.help: For each index, perform specified statistical operations on the data output by the upstream node. This type of node can be safely chained infinitely, and chained nodes will not affect the results of downstream nodes.
aggregatorNode.noColumnsFound: No available columns found, please check upstream node configuration

outputNode.help: Specify the output file save location. Note that each input connection will be saved as a worksheet

file.file_expired: File expiration check failed, this may cause data errors!
file.expirationCheckFailed: File expiration check failed, which may cause data errors!
file.someFilesOutdatedDetailed: Some files are outdated. Please go to File Management to sync.
file.needFileManagerAction: * Please go to File Manager for operations

add.title: Add File
add.missingData: Cannot add file: Missing path, alias, or valid preview data.
add.previewError: Cannot add file: Please resolve the preview error first.
add.alreadyExists: File '{{fileName}}' already exists in the workspace.
add.fileInfoError: Could not get file information. Please check if the file exists.

file.addTitle: Add a new file to the workspace
file.addDescription: Select an Excel or CSV file to add it to the current workspace for use in your flows.
file.pathPlaceholder: File path will be displayed here
file.namePlaceholder: Set an alias for the file

addError.missingData: Cannot add file: Missing path, alias, or valid preview data.
addError.previewError: Cannot add file: Please resolve the preview error first.
addError.alreadyExists: File '{{fileName}}' already exists in the workspace.
addError.getInfoFailed: Could not get file information. Please check if the file exists.

file.noFiles: No files have been added to the current workspace yet.

syncError.getInfoFailed: Could not get file information, the file may have been deleted.
syncError.readFailed: Could not read file content, the file may be corrupted.
syncError.generic: An unknown error occurred while syncing the file.

meta.title: Metadata Editor
meta.headerRowTooltip: The header row is used to identify column names. 0 means the first row, 1 means the second, and so on. An incorrect row number will cause execution errors!
meta.headerRowWarning: Warning! Incorrect header row number will cause execution errors or failures!
meta.noHeaderDetected: No header detected or current setting is incorrect

api.backend_not_started: Backend service not started, this might be a bug
api.missing_params: Must provide workspaceId or workspaceConfigJson parameter

error.network: Network error. Please check if the backend service is running and the network connection is stable.

backend.initializing: Please wait, backend service is initializing...
